name: Talk Vincent and Luther
_source: s;Vincent;Luther, have you been here before?
s;Luther;It was a long time ago.{w}{br}Lord Simon's father was much closer to Lord Morrissey.{w}{br}I accompanied him as a general when Lord Morrissey would invite allies for festivities.
s;Vincent;Oh, hey Simon.{w}{br}Talk to Lord Morrissey yet?

s;Simon;Not quite.{w}{br}If I can be honest, I'm just not sure if he'll listen.{w}{br}I've really neglected our relationship with House Morrissey...{w}{br}All my father built up...{w} I let it crumble.

s;Luther;We've had our own concerns since your father's time.{w}{br}With the world in such a state, we've needed to protect ourselves first.{w}{br}Anyway, alliances can be repaired.{w}{br}You just need to speak with him.
s;Vincent;I can't say I know anything about diplomacy and all that, but I trust you, Simon.{w}{br}I'm sure if you tell him about what happened, he'll help us.
